## parseHexColor() function

Parse a hex color string to RGB.

Supports both short form (\#RGB) and long form (\#RRGGBB) hex colors. The \# prefix is optional.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function parseHexColor(hex: string): RGB | null;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

hex


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

Hex color string (e.g., '\#cd3131', 'cd3131', '\#fff', 'fff')


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[RGB](./chromaterm.rgb.md) \| null

RGB object with r, g, b values (0-255), or null if invalid
